title: The Cleric Quintet: In Sylvan Shadows (The Cleric Quintet #2)
description: Storyline: "Cadderly must leave his home to combat the evil unleashed by the Chaos Curse. To counter Castle Trinity's plans for conquest, the cleric and his friends enter the beautiful forest of Shilmista. But among the trees and glades of the forest, Cadderly must battle a monstrous evil."\n
author: R.A. Salvatore
